import React from 'react' import { useForm } from '../CustomHooks' const normalItem = ({data, edit, remove}) => (

{data.name}

{data.description}

{data.rating}/5

) const editableItem = ({data, save}) => { const {inputs, handleInputChange } = useForm() return (
)} const Item = ({ data, ...props}) => data.editable ? editableItem({data, ...props}) : normalItem({data, ...props}) export default Item
